channel.title: Text Editors - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: stdout (Standard Out) I/O (input/output streams) $ echo Hello World > Peanuts.txt Writes Hello World to a new file called Peanuts.txt Processes use I/O streams to receive input and return output. echo takes the input of the keyboard and returns it as output to the screen. > Is an I/O redirection operator that changes where the standard output goes. if the file already exist the contents will be overwritten. $ echo Hello World Â» Peanuts.
